MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and to complete a repair due to an underground cable fault at Clunie road, we now needed to carry out an emergency shutdown immediately for safety. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40am on Wednesday, 24 February 2021
